General.Name: Kangping Technology (Suzhou) Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Kangping Technology (Suzhou) Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, design, production, and sale of motors and related products. Its products include motors, complete power tools, precision hardware, plastic parts, etc. for the power tool industry. Kangping Technology (Suzhou) Co., Ltd. was founded in 2004 and is based in Suzhou, China.
